feed.title: BIPs - notarization protocol and decentralized storage

entry.title: BIPs - notarization protocol and decentralized storage
entry.summary: During a discussion on Bitcoin development, Prayank suggested that a Lightning Network (LN) project may be more appropriate than a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP). The conversation revolved around collaborations and the benefits they bring to the Bitcoin software. Luke noted that LN should actually be a collection of BIPs, indicating that the network could benefit from further standardization proposals.
